UB_SWITCH_ICON_USER_POPOUT_DESC: Display in user popout and user modal.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_TOASTS_DESC: Send an in-app toast when it's someone's birthday.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_POPUP_DESC: Trigger a pop-up when it's someone's birthday.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_DESKTOP_DESC: Send a desktop notification when it's someone's birthday.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_TOASTS_NO_FOCUS_DESC: Show an in-app toast when the window is unfocused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_TOASTS_FOCUS_DESC: Show an in-app toast when the window is focused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_TOASTS_SOUND_DESC: Plays a customizable sound on toast (to change, head over to the [Customize](onCustomizeClick) tab).
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_DESKTOP_NO_FOCUS_DESC: Show a desktop notification when the window is unfocused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_DESKTOP_FOCUS_DESC: Show a desktop notification when the window is focused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_POPUP_NO_FOCUS_DESC: Show a popup when the window is unfocused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_POPUP_FOCUS_DESC: Show a popup when the window is focused.
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_POPUP_SOUND_DESC: Plays a customizable sound on popup (to change, head over to the [Customize](onCustomizeClick) tab).
UB_SWITCH_TOOLBAR_NOTE: Whether to show the cake icon within the toolbar or not.
UB_SWITCH_FRIENDS_TOOLBAR_NOTE: Whether to only show the cake icon within the toolbar in the friends tab or everywhere.
UB_SETTINGS_CUSTOMIZE_TAB_SOUND_DESC: Customize the sound that gets played when one of the alerts that you chose appears.
UB_SETTINGS_PERSONALIZED_MESSAGE_PLACEHO: Treat your friends with the perfect personalized message. If left blank, a simple "Happy birthday!" will be used instead.
UB_SETTINGS_VARIABLES_DESC: Usable variables within the personalized message. To use them, surround them with {}
UB_DATE_USERS_MODAL_NOT_FOUND: No birthdays were found on this day.
UB_DATE_USERS_TIP: Did you know? You can click on a card to open your direct messages with that person.
